question: A cleaner has to clean a office building with 120 floors. They have 3 days to get it done. It takes them 15 minutes per floor. If they work 15 hours each day, what percentage of their day, on average, is spent cleaning floors?
answer:
They have to clean 40 floors a day because 120 / 3 = <<120/3=40>>40
They spend 600 minutes cleaning per day because 40*15 = <<40*15=600>>600
They spend 10 hours a day because 600 / 60 = <<600/60=10>>10
They spend 2/3 of their day cleaning floors because 10 / 15 = <<10/15=0.6666666666666666>>0.6666666666666666
They spend 66% of their day cleaning floors because 0.6666666666666666*100 = <<0.6666666666666666*100=66>>66
#### 66
